original_text: Then the mariners were afraid, and each cried out to his god. And they hurled the cargo that was in the ship into the sea to lighten it for them. But Jonah had gone down into the inner part of the ship and had lain down and was fast asleep.
korean_text: 사공들이 두려워하여 각각 자기의 신을 부르고 또 배를 가볍게 하려고 그 가운데 물건들을 바다에 던지니라 그러나 요나는 배 밑층에 내려가서 누워 깊이 잠이 든지라

sentences.original_text: and each cried out to his god.
And they hurled the cargo into the sea
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 배의 짐을 바다에 던졌습니다

sentences.original_text: But Jonah had gone down into the inner part of the ship
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 요나는 배의 가장 안쪽 부분으로 내려갔습니다
